refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The fstrace clear command erases the contents of the trace log from kernel memory, but leaves kernel memory allocated for the log.

listitem.para: Names the event set for which to clear the associated trace log. The only acceptable value is cm (for which the associated trace log is cmfx). Provide either this argument or the -log argument, or omit both to clear the cmfx log by default.
Names the trace log to clear. The only acceptable value is cmfx. Provide either this argument or the -set argument, or omit both to clear the cmfx log by default.
Prints the online help for this command. All other valid options are ignored.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para: The following command clears the cmfx trace log on the local machine:

refsect1.title: Privilege Required
refsect1.para: The issuer must be logged in as the local superuser root.
